_comment1: If sub count is lower than this, it will be stored in database (int) [Leaving 0 stores no channels in database]
_comment2: Videos uploaded these many days back, will be scraped (float) [Try to keep <= 60]
_comment3: While searching keywords, these many videos will be scraped (int) [Try to keep it <= 3]
_comment4: Timeout in seconds for as to how long to wait for element to load (int). [Try to keep >=30 & <=60]
_comment5: Videos under this many views will not be scraped (int)
